content:
Hello Implementers,
Can someone kindly tell me where can I find examples for FhirPath Patch ?. I just see this page http://build.fhir.org/fhirpatch.html but unfortunately not able to get any example other than birthdate example working. So, looking for examples which involve patching reference. i.e. say I wanted to update a generalPractitioner reference in /patient resource.

thanks for your kind help, appreciate it.

Hi All,

I have gone through the test cases link but I don't find any example which supports the references which are creating in the same bundle like placeholder references .
i am able to patch the references which is already created but i want to patch a resource with the bundle of the reference in the same transaction

Grahame Grieve said:

https://github.com/FHIR/fhir-test-cases/tree/master/r5/patch

thanks @Grahame Grieve . thanks for your reply and appreciate your help. Unfortunately, like the previous comment, I am not able to see any valueReference examples. If you could kindly point to a link if any would be helpful. thanks
